casebody.data:
In the Matter of SOL GOODMAN, Inc., Bankrupt. Abraham Goldberg, Creditor. No. 261. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Dec. 18, 1933. Abraham Goldberg, of New York City, in pro. per. Hartman, Sheridan, Tekulsky & Pecora, of New York City (Julius Silver, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee Irving Trust Co. as trustee.

. Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS' N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges,

PER CURIAM,

Decision (5 F. Supp. 517) affirmed.
